title: Aatrox W
body: I dont know if its just me or my game but, For some reason everytime i auto attack with aatrox, i can hear in every hit the sound of when the third heal or damage proc hits. if this is more than just myself then hopefully they can fix this in a new patch?

replies.body: Sometimes it screws with me, thinking i have the next proc but dont xD
I actually love it !  Makes me feel powerful xD
